sentences.en: He was considered unfit to hold office because of moral turpitude.
sentences.cn: 为了道德上的可耻行为,他被认为不适担任公务员.

sentences.en: Let every declamation turn upon the beauty of liberty and virtue, and the deformity, turpitude, and malignity of slavery and vice.
sentences.cn: 让每一篇演讲都来谈自由和道德之美，都来谈奴役和邪恶之丑陋、卑鄙和恶毒。
